general_error_not_supported_os.message: xxThis extension is only supported on Linux and FreeBSD.xx

general_error_startup_failed.message: xxMake sure the 'plasma-browser-integration' package is installed correctly and that you are running Plasma 5.13 or later.xx

general_error_startup_failed_title.message: xxFailed to connect to the native host.xx

general_error_startup_failed_wiki_link.message: xxVisit project wiki page for more informationxx

options_about_bugs.message: xxIf you find an issue, please check the list of open bugs and then file a bug report.xx

options_about_copyright.message: xx© 2017-2020 Kai Uwe Broulik and David Edmundsonxx

options_about_created_by_kde.message: xxThis browser extension was created by the KDE Community. You can find more information about this project on the KDE Community Wiki.xx

options_about_donate.message: xxIf you like what you saw, please consider donating to KDE, so we can continue to make the best free software possible.xx

options_about_kde.message: xxKDE is a world-wide community of software engineers, artists, writers, translators and creators who are committed to Free Software development. KDE produces the Plasma desktop environment, hundreds of applications, and the many software libraries that support them. KDE is a cooperative enterprise: no single entity controls its direction or products. Instead, we work together to achieve the common goal of building the world's finest Free Software. Everyone is welcome to join and contribute to KDE, including you. Visit $3 for more information about the KDE community and the software we produce.xx

options_about_license.message: xxLicense: GNU General Public License Version 3xx

options_not_supported_os.message: xxThis extension is not supported on this operating system.xx

options_plugin_breezeScrollBars_descript.message: xxThis may interfere with the appearance of websites that already apply a custom styling to their scroll bars.xx

options_plugin_downloads_addToRecentDocu.message: xxAdd downloaded files to recent documentsxx

options_plugin_downloads_saveOriginUrl.message: xxSave URL a file was downloaded from in the file's attributesxx

options_plugin_downloads_saveOriginUrl_d.message: xxNote: The URL may contain sensitive information that could be disclosed when the file is accessible by or shared with othersxx

options_plugin_historyrunner_description.message: xxThis feature might need additional permissions to be used.xx

options_plugin_kdeconnect_description.message: xxAdds a context menu entry to links enabling you to send them to your phone and other paired devices using KDE Connect.xx

options_plugin_mpris_description.message: xxLets you control video and audio players in websites using the Media Controller plasmoid.xx

options_plugin_mpris_media_sessions_desc.message: xxExtract metadata and thumbnails of currently playing content.xx

options_plugin_purpose_description.message: xxAdds a "Share..." context menu entry and allows websites to open a dialog for sharing contents using the Web Share API.xx

options_plugin_tabsrunner_description.message: xxMake sure the “Browser Tabs” module is enabled in Plasma Search settings.xx

options_plugin_tabsrunner_title.message: xxFind browser tabs in “Run Command” windowxx

permission_request_already.message: xxYou have already granted this permission.xx

permission_request_historyrunner_1.message: xxIn order to provide search results for your browser history, additional permissions are required.xx

permission_request_historyrunner_2.message: xxYou can disable this feature in Plasma search settings.xx

purpose_share_finished_text.message: xxThe shared content link ($1) has been copied to the clipboard.xx

store_description.message:
Multitask efficiently by controlling browser functions from the desktop, even while Chrome is in the background. Manage audio and video playback, check downloads in the notification area, send files to your phone using KDE Connect and more inside the KDE Plasma Desktop!

The plasma-browser-integration package must be installed for this extension to work. It should be available from your distribution's package manager when running Plasma 5.13 or later.

NOTE: This extension is not supported on Debian.
